entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
